text:
Malcolm Park is situated near Stevens MRT Station. It's a short walk along Whitley Road from Stevens MRT. It is also next to Tanglin Community Club and CPIB Corruption Reporting & Heritage Centre.
The park has an exercise corner on the hill slope. Rest benches are strategically located around the park.
Unfortunately, there are no rain shelters, but otherwise a clean and pleasant green space.
Up the slope or climbing up the stairs lead to some beautiful Colonial Houses.
quiet and quaint little park, foot traffic is extremely low. great for a breather.
A small park in a quieter neighborhood along Bukit Rumah.

This is a nice park set in the hill next to Whitley Road. It has an exercise corner with chin-up bars, situp benches and more.

It also has a CPIB heritage centre and a neighbourhood police post. All in all, a pleasant place.
pretty nice place to sit and chill. unfortunately it's located on the side of a hill, and sometimes it feels like you're sitting right smack in the middle of the sun
